name: The price filters work even when no products match found -- @1.2

steps.name: When User sets the price filter to 1200 dollars and 1500 dollars using the slide bar
Then Click on the filter button
Then "No products were found matching your selection." message shown if no products match selected filters
When Click on X from the maximum price filter to remove it
Then Verify the Price filter worked
When Click on X from the minimum price filter to remove it
Then Verify the Price filter worked

parameters.name: no_products_message
parameters.value: No products were found matching your selection.

fullName: Test Scenarios for no match in GetTop shop page: The price filters work even when no products match found

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Test Scenarios for no match in GetTop shop page
